==Interactables==
===Recordkeeping Secret Source Sentinel===
{{Dialogue Start}}
(A [[Secret Source Sentinel]] used for recording. Two recordings are within, and they are dated very far apart indeed. One of them goes like this...)<br>
"I'm sorry, [[Sakkuk]]... I'm sorry..."<br>
"The feather accessory I made for you... It is in a stone box on my table... I did not think that I, [[Manqu (Historical)|Manqu]], would..."<br>
"A promise... cannot... ah..."<br><br>
(The other, more recent recording, is as follows...)<br>
"I must be careful... This is no place for... Damn it... The [[Flower-Feather Clan]]'s blockade..."<br>
"Should have known... not to come, haha. But since... to die in the same place as those of yesteryear..."<br>
"Agh... Urgh... Go, go, quick! There are... monsters..."
{{Dialogue End}}
